items.title: Black Friday 2025 deal schedule: Best Buy, Amazon, Costco, LEGO, Walmart, more
items.summary:
The 2025 Black Friday deal season is upon us and early details from the major retailers are starting to flood in. This year we are already getting official confirmation from many of the biggest retailers and brands on when you can expect the Black Friday and Thanksgiving deals to begin and it looks like we are going to be getting a full month worth of big-time discounts in 2025. Deals are actually kicking off on October 31 this year and carrying right through to Thanksgiving 2025 and Black Friday with various sale events throughout the month of November. 

more…

items.title: Meta launches "ghost posts" on Threads, letting users share "unfiltered thoughts" in posts that disappear after 24 hours; replies will appear as a DM (Marcus Mendes/9to5Mac)
items.summary:
Marcus Mendes / 9to5Mac:
Meta launches “ghost posts” on Threads, letting users share “unfiltered thoughts” in posts that disappear after 24 hours; replies will appear as a DM  —  Threads is rolling out ghost posts, which get automatically archived after 24 hours.  Here's how it works.

items.title: Qualcomm is turning parts from cellphone chips into AI chips to rival Nvidia
items.summary: Qualcomm is launching a pair of new AI chips in an attempt to challenge Nvidia’s dominance in the market. On Monday, Qualcomm announced plans to release its new AI200 chip next year, followed by the AI250 in 2027 — both of which are built on the company’s mobile neural processing technology.  The new chips are […]

items.title: Threads adds ‘ghost posts’ that disappear after 24 hours
items.summary: Instagram Threads is launching “ghost posts,” a new disappearing-posts feature that lets users share updates that automatically archive after 24 hours. The ephemeral option—rolling out globally on Monday—aims to encourage more casual, low-pressure sharing

items.title: Sora is showing us how broken deepfake detection is
items.summary: OpenAI's new deepfake machine, Sora, has proven that artificial intelligence is alarmingly good at faking reality. The AI-generated video platform, powered by OpenAI's new Sora 2 model, has churned out detailed (and often offensive or harmful) videos of famous people like Martin Luther King Jr., Michael Jackson, and Bryan Cranston, as well as copyrighted characters […]

items.title: Threads is getting disappearing posts
items.summary: Threads is launching a new feature called the “ghost post:” a post it will automatically archive after 24 hours. These posts will come in handy if you want to share a thought, but don’t want to keep it on your profile. It’s also a feature that users on X, formerly Twitter, have long requested, leading them […]

items.summary: Mercor, which connects AI labs with domain experts for training their foundational AI models, is close to raising $350 million at a $10 billion valuation.

items.title: Hurricane Melissa could be strongest ever to hit Jamaica
items.summary: Melissa has been upgraded to a category five storm and could become Jamaica's strongest on record.

items.title: Anwar, Wan Azizah host Asean leaders, spouses at gala dinner
items.summary: KUALA LUMPUR: Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim and wife, Datuk Seri Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail, on Monday (Oct 27) hosted a Gala Dinner in honour of Asean leaders and their spouses, celebrating friendship, unity, and cultural diversity in conjunction with the 47th Asean Summit and Related Meetings at the Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre. items.summary: Trump rules out running for vice-president, an idea floated by supporters to circumvent the US constitution which bars him from running again.

items.title: Bring Fremo’s X300 276Wh power station on trips for essential backup at a new $176 low (Reg. up to $330, Today only)
items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is offering the best rate yet on the Fremo X300 Portable Power Station that is down at $175.99 shipped, and has been unavailable at Amazon since early August. Without discounts you’d be paying $330 for this unit in full, which we’ve been seeing regularly fall between $250 and $190 in these one-day-only deals, with things having hit $180 at the top of this month. Through the rest of the day, you can grab one with more savings than ever, as $154 is cut from the tag to land it at a new all-time low price.

items.title: X is getting closer to removing the last reminders of Twitter
items.summary: X is preparing to put Twitter.com out to pasture, and the official @Safety account posted on Friday warning anyone using physical security keys or passkeys for 2FA that they will need to re-enroll them. According to X, if the login methods aren’t updated by November 10th, the associated accounts will be locked until the update […]

items.title: Chile election poll shows leftist Jara losing to right-wing rivals in runoff
items.summary: SANTIAGO (Reuters) -The candidate for Chile's ruling leftist coalition, communist Jeannette Jara, leads voters' preferences ahead of the first round of the presidential election, but could lose in a runoff against either of two right-wing opposition candidates, a poll showed on Monday. items.title: LEGO announces official Black Friday 2025 details and Insiders Weekend dates
items.summary:
November is almost here, which means we’re getting more and more LEGO news and unveilings, particularly on the newest building sets that will be releasing next year. That doesn’t mean we haven’t also gotten news on sets hitting shelves in 2025 too, like the long-awaited LEGO Ideas 21363 The Goonies set that will be the final addition to the theme for this year, and more. Today, we’ve gotten the official schedule and some details on the upcoming LEGO Insiders Weekend 2025, which will only last a few days with special offers and GWPs (which we have no information on yet). We’ve also got some details to answer your LEGO Black Friday and Cyber Monday questions, all waiting for you below.

items.title: ‘Clinical-grade AI’: a new buzzy AI word that means absolutely nothing

items.title: Samsung’s 2025 43-inch 4K UHD M7 Smart Monitor now down to its lowest price at $175 off
items.summary:
Update: As part of its updated Samsung monitor sale, Woot is offering the brand’s latest 43-inch M7 (M70F) Smart Monitor for $324.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This is the lowest price we have tracked for this 4K UHD display, and you’ll find more details in the below post.

As part of its wider sale on Samsung monitors, Woot is offering the brand’s latest 43-inch M7 (M70F) Smart Monitor for $359.99 $324.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This is regularly a $500 display that recently hit the scene as part of Samsung’s Smart Monitor lineup. It dropped to the $380 mark earlier this month during the fall Prime Day sale at Amazon, but today’s deal at Woot steps it up with an additional $20 $55 discount. This is the lowest we have seen this 43-inch M70F variant fetch to date, so be sure to cash in before it jumps back up to its full price. Alternatively, you can save more on this monitor if you don’t mind picking up an open box unit directly from Samsung at $319.99 shipped. Head below for more details.
